charmingly10: It's so difficult for people to understand that girls can have dreams and we can look more than what we have got. And we work hard for it it's not handed to us in silver platter. Infact nothing is handed to us on a silver platter. This society is tightly gripped with the mindset that women with too many dreams, achievements, ambitions are not the one to be able to keep a happy household. Maybe they need to understand that while some girls dream about a happy married (which is a good dream too) some of us dream of pushing and being and doing so much more. I salute the women who broke from this pretentious and unwilling cage and brought on the changes that allowed us to dream too. Thank you for your contribution.
